title: Superconducting film magnetic flux transformer with micro- and nanosized branches

authors.name: Л. П. Ичкитидзе
affiliations: National Research University of Electronic Technology

abstract: The object of the study is a superconducting film magnetic flux transformer comprising two square shaped loops with the tapering active strips and a magnetosensitive film element between them. It is shown that splitting of the active strips into parallel micro- and nanosized superconducting branches and slits increases the gain factor of the transformer, i. e., the concentration of an external magnetic field on the magnetosensitive element, by a factor of more than four.
